attributes.title: Koral Brazillian JiuJitsu GI
attributes.description: Worn to train, compete, and become a world champion in Brazilian JiuJitsu.  Teaching techniques passed down from generation to generation you need a GI that replicates quality, durability, and style that is a shield and weapon for a top level BJJ player ready for battle.
Manufacturer and supplier of Kimonos, belts, training apparel, boxing gloves, and other martial arts equipment supplier to Koral Fight Company.

attributes.description: Top-level Instruction in Brazilian JiuJitsu, Muay Thai, and Strength Conditioning.
